languages.text: Мощные удары крошат полые кости, высверленные искусником гемункулом. Их легкость служила мне в полете, но предала здесь, на земле. Я теряю опору, мое тело становится мягким, словно тряпка.

Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.
languages.original_text: Мощные удары крошат полые кости, высверленные искусником гемункулом. Их легкость служила мне в полете, но предала здесь, на земле. Я теряю опору, мое тело становится мягким, словно тряпка.

traits.locale_text: The powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness had served me during the flight but betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body becoming limp as a rag.

The powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness had served me during the flight but betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body becoming limp as a rag.

Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness had served me right during the flight but betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body getting softer as a rag.

Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness had served me right during the flight but betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body getting softer as a rag.

Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

languages.text: 強力な打撃が、狡猾なハモンキュラスによって作られた空洞の骨を砕く。飛行中はその軽さが役に立ったが、地上では真逆である。私はしかと立つことができず、体は雑巾のようにへたれこんでいく。
languages.original_text: Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

traits.locale_text: 強力な打撃が、狡猾なハモンキュラスによって作られた空洞の骨を砕く。飛行中はその軽さが役に立ったが、地上では真逆である。私はしかと立つことができず、体は雑巾のようにへたれこんでいく。

languages.text: 猎物的猛力打击击碎了血伶人改造过的空心骨骼。尽管空心骨骼非常轻盈，适合飞行，但在地面上却极其脆弱。我被打得头重脚轻，身体就像破布一样晃晃荡荡。
languages.original_text: Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

traits.locale_text: 猎物的猛力打击，击碎了血伶人改造过的空心骨骼。尽管空心骨骼非常轻盈，适合飞行，但在地面上却极其脆弱。我被打得头重脚轻，身体就像破布一样晃晃荡荡。

languages.text: Sus golpes poderosos aplastan los huesos huecos taladrados por el astuto Hemónculo. Su ligereza me fue útil durante el vuelo, pero me ha traicionado aquí en el suelo. Pierdo el equilibrio y mi cuerpo queda inerte como un trapo.
languages.original_text: Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

traits.locale_text: Sus golpes poderosos aplastan los huesos huecos taladrados por el astuto Hemónculo. Su ligereza me fue útil durante el vuelo, pero me ha traicionado aquí en el suelo. Pierdo el equilibrio y mi cuerpo se ablanda como un trapo.

languages.text: Mächtige Hiebe zerstören die hohlen Knochen, die von dem gerissenen Haemonculus mit Bohrlöchern versehen wurden. Im Flug war es mir eine Hilfe, dass sie so leicht sind, doch hier am Boden haben sie mich verraten. Ich verliere das Gleichgewicht, mein Körper wird weich wie Stoff.
languages.original_text: Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

traits.locale_text: Mächtige Hiebe zerstören die hohlen Knochen, die von dem gerissenen Haemonculus mit Bohrlöchern versehen wurden. Im Flug war es mir eine Hilfe, dass sie so leicht sind, doch hier am Boden haben sie mich verraten. Ich verliere das Gleichgewicht, mein Körper wird weicher als ein Lumpen.

languages.text: Les coups puissants de la proie fracturent les os forés par l'hémoncule. Essentielle pour voler, leur légèreté me rend extrêmement vulnérable au sol. Je perds l'équilibre et mon corps commence à me faire défaut.
languages.original_text: Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

traits.locale_text: Les coups puissants de la proie fracturent les os creusés par l'hémoncule. Essentielle pour voler, leur légèreté me rend extrêmement vulnérable au sol. Je perds l'équilibre et mon corps commence à me faire défaut.

languages.text: Güçlü darbeler, Haimonkulus'un becerikli bir şekilde oyduğu, boş kemikleri kırıyor. Hafiflikleri uçuş sırasında çok işime yaradı ancak yerdeyken beni yüzüstü bıraktılar. Tökezliyorum ve bedenim paçavra gibi gevşiyor.
languages.original_text: Powerful blows crush the hollow bones drilled by the crafty Haemonculus. Their lightness served me well during the flight but has betrayed me here on the ground. I lose my footing, my body going floppy like a rag.

traits.locale_text: Güçlü darbeler, Haimonkulus'un becerikli bir şekilde oyduğu, boş kemikleri kırıyor. Hafiflikleri uçuş sırasında çok işime yaradı ancak yerdeyken beni yüzüstü bıraktılar. Tökezliyorum ve bedenim paçavra gibi gevşiyor.
